verses.content: LALPA chun Mosie a biek a,
“Israel thlahai chu oliv hriek inthiengtak, sit dinga sâwr, khâwn- var sukchawk zingna dinga i kuoma hung la dingin thu pe rawh.
Intuokna puon ina thuinhriettir- na puonzâr puotienga chun, zân- tienga inthawka zingkâr chena dingin, LALPA hmaah Aron chun sie fel raw se; hi hi in thlahai chena kumkhaw dân ding a nih.
LALPA hmaah khâwnvar siena inthiengtak chunga chun khâwnvar- hai chu sie fel hlak raw se.
“Chun, beiphit indi mi la la, chu chu bei sâwmpahnia siemin ur la, bei pakhat chu epha hmun sâwma ṭheha hmun hni peia siem ding a nih.
LALPA hmaa dawkân inthieng chunga chun tlar hniin, tlar khata paruk ve vein în tlar ding a nih.
A tlar hnia chun beraw inthieng- tak i sie ve ve ding a nih, chu chu bei le chun hriet zingna, LALPA kuoma mei hmanga thilinhlân ang a hung ni theina dingin.
Châwlni taphawtah LALPA hmaah Aron chun a sie fel hlak ding a nih, kumkhaw thuthlungna, Israel thlahai ta ding a nih.
Chun, Aron le a naupasalhai chanpuol nîng a ta, hmun inthiengah an fâk ding a nih; kumkhaw dâna LALPA kuoma mei hmanga thilin- hlânhai laia mi, a chanpuol inthieng tak a ni sih a,” tiin.
Israel nuhmei naupa, a pa chu Aigupta mi, pakhat chu Israel thlahai lai a va feh a; chu Israel nuhmei naupa le Israel mi pakhat riebûka chun an insuol a;
Israel nuhmei naupa chun ṭawngsie inphurin Pathien hming a hrilsiet a; chuongchun, ama chu Mosie kuomah an hung ṭhuoi a. A nu hming chu Selomith a na. Dan chi Dibri naunu a nih.
LALPA baua thu suok nghâkna dingin intângna inah an khum a.
Chun, LALPA chun Mosie a biek a,
“Ṭawngsiea inkhâmtu chu rie- bûk puoah ṭhuoi unla, a hretuhai po po chun a luah an kut innghat hai sienla, mi po po chun lungin dêng raw hai se.
Chun, Israel thlahai chu hril la, an kuomah, ‘Tukhawm a Pathien ṭawngsie inphur taphawt chun a suol maw chu phur a tih.
Chun, LALPA hming hrilsetu taphawt chu sukhlum ngei ding a nih; mi po poin lungin dêng an ta; LALPA hming an hrilsiet chun ram dang mi khawm, a ram mi khawm sukhlum ding an nih.
Tuolthattu chu sukhlum ngei ding a nih.
Ran thattu taphawt chun a thung ding a nih, hringna aiah hringna.
Miin a tuolbâwm a sukhmêlhem chun, a thaw angtak chun a chungah thaw ve ding a nih; ru tliek aiah ru tliek, mit aiah mit, ha aiah ha;
mi a sukhmêlhem angin ama chunga khawm thaw ve ding a nih.
Ran sukhlumtu chun a thung ding a nih; mi sukhlumtu chu suk- hlum ve ding a nih.
Ram dang mihai le a ram mihai ta dingin dân hmunkhat in nei ding a nih; kei hi LALPA in Pathien chu ka ni sih a,’ ti rawh,” tiin.
Chuongchun, Mosie chun Israel thlahai chu a biek a; ṭawngsiea inkhâmtu chu riebûk puoah an ṭhuoi suok a, lungin an dêng a. Israel thla- hai chun LALPAIN Mosie thu a pêk ang chun an thaw tah a.
